title: PaperCut printer security flaw may be much worse than initially thought
description: As researchers release PoCs, hackers are using the flaws to deliver remote management tools

title: AWS just revealed a host of security upgrades to keep your cloud systems safe
description: Three new upgrades are coming to Amazon Web Services to keep your cloud protected.

title: Two IKEA smart home devices are getting an upgrade in 2024
description: IKEA has plans to launch upgraded versions of its Fyrtur and Kadrilj smart blinds in 2024.

title: Auto-GPT will supercharge ChatGPT and change how we use it – in very scary ways
description: ChatGPT may get an incredible boost with applications like Auto-GPT, which aims to give autonomy to the chatbot.

title: What is the RESTRICT Act and how will it affect the tech industry?
description: The so-called TikTok ban bill could restrict way more IT services than that—even VPNs. Here's what's at stake for US users.

title: WhatsApp is getting a long-awaited update so you can use it on multiple phones
description: The latest WhatsApp update is great news if you use more than one handset.

title: Google reveals its AI-powered security rival to Microsoft Security Copilot
description: Generative AI in cybersecurity promises a time-saving, helping hand to experts, but at what risk?

title: Thousands of fake Facebook profiles could be trying to steal your data
description: A major identity theft campaign is currently active and targeting Facebook users, researchers report.

title: AMD, Intel, Qualcomm could face their ultimate nemesis in Risc-y move
description: Dozens of chip makers may have to reassess their relationship with Arm.

title: The Witcher season 3 release date has been revealed – and it's coming in two parts
description: Netflix has finally announced when The Witcher's next season will make its debut.

title: Samsung is facing a huge fine for infringing on memory patents
description: Netlist awarded $303 million in settlement from Samsung, which failed to comply with memory patents.

title: Diablo 4 is going hardcore with one feature that’ll make you cry
description: Community director for Diablo 4 Adam Fletcher confirmed that dying in PvP will result in a permadeath.

title: This ChatGPT-powered iPhone assistant can supercharge your next Apple Music playlist
description: The 2.1. update for Petey allows it to create playlists in Apple Music and adds GPT-4 support to the Siri rival.

title: Some Intel CPUs are at risk from serious cybersecurity flaw
description: Multiple Intel CPUs are vulnerable to data leaks, but there's still some questions over how serious the flaw is.

title: The triple-camera DJI Mavic 3 Pro is the world's most versatile drone
description: The DJI Mavic 3 Pro is finally official – and the triple-lens drone promises to be a super-versatile flying camera.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 and Flip 5 might be Unpacked sooner than expected
description: Samsung’s Unpacked event – where we expect to see its latest foldables – is now rumored to be in July rather than August.

title: Your workplace Slack could be about to get a whole host of new expansions
description: Slack workflows will now be easier to build and deploy, with integrations forming Standard and (paid) Premium workflows.

title: Forecast for Windows 11’s Weather app: showers of ads with a frosty reception
description: Don’t look now, but adverts are creeping into another part of Windows 11.

title: DJI Mavic 3 Pro launch live: all the latest from DJI's big new drone launch
description: DJI is launching a new drone very soon – and all of the rumors are pointing towards a Mavic 3 Pro with three cameras.

title: Meta’s got a Twitter Alternative in the works and it can’t come soon enough
description: In the midst of the constant Twitter turmoil, Meta has found its opportunity to try an alternative app - and it looks promising.

title: Anker takes aim at Apple HomePod 2 with a cheaper Spatial Audio Bluetooth speaker
description: Anker’s new Motion X600 Bluetooth speaker boasts five drivers in total, including a ‘sky driver’ for LDAC and Spatial Audio.

title: Microsoft Edge reckons it could be a big productivity boost for your workers
description: Collaborating on tab groups is finally coming to Microsoft Edge, several years after Apple and Google announced similar browser features.

title: Apple Watch Series 9 leak shows off watchOS 10 in all its glory
description: A new leak shows us a drastic overhaul for watchOS 10 and Apple Watch Series 9.

title: Opera One is a new AI-powered browser that aims to beat Chrome and Edge
description: The redesigned Opera aims to be more streamlined and responsive, and has serious ambitions in the AI sphere.

title: AMD’s new Ryzen CPUs are randomly burning out – here’s everything we know
description: AMD’s new Ryzen 7000X3D chips are great, but trying to overclock yours could leave you with a dead processor.

title: Google Authenticator is fixing a problem that should help all users at last
description: After much demand, Google Authenticator now finally lets you sync your saved 2FA accounts to your Google account.

title: Microsoft Teams is about to become optional for Office users
description: Previously, having Microsoft Teams installed alongside Office was a requirement, but that’s about to change.

title: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra might beat the iPhone 15 Ultra with a massive sensor
description: A report claims the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra will have a 1-inch camera sensor, but we have our doubts.

title: Businesses are getting much better at dealing with ransomware attacks
description: The number of successful ransomware attacks remains high, with firms still meeting demands.

title: Xbox Game Pass is seeing one of the best horror game series arrive in May
description: The next installment in the Amnesia series is coming to Xbox Game Pass in May.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Tuesday, April 25 (game #456)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
